definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: decay, rot, fester, fig. pine away (NH id.; Aram. (Targum) [[מְקַק]]);—
rot, rot away, :[[עֵתנָיו תִּמַּקְנׇה בְחׂרֵיהֶן וּלְשׁוֹנוֹ תִּמִק בְּפִיהֶ֫ם ]] Zec 14:12 (plague upon foes of Jerusalem).
. moulder away, of [[חְבָא הַשָּׁמַיִם]] Is 34:4 (‖[[וְנׇנׁלוּ כַּסֵּפֶר]] [[הַשָּׁמַיִם]].
. of pining away by reason of ([[בְּ]]), as punishment for, iniquity Ez Eze 4:17, Eze 24:23, Eze 33:10, Le 26:39, Le 26:39.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Inf. abs. [[הָמֵק]], trans. [[בְּשָׂרוֹ]] ´[[ה]] Zec 14:12 a causing his flesh to rot.
